TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BrowserCapabilitiesFactoryBase extends System.Object

span.span: The class is the base class from which is derived.

summary.span: 它由配置系统在运行时在内部使用，以创建 类的请求特定的实例，这些实例可通过 ASP.NET 内部的 属性进行公共访问。

span.span: It is used internally at run time by the configuration system to create request-specific instances of the class, publicly accessed through the ASP.NET intrinsic property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.browser 文件中定义浏览器功能。You define browser capabilities in a .browser file. 你可以.browser 文件中使用的默认层次结构，或创建自定义的层次结构，以定义的浏览器功能。You can use the default hierarchy in the .browser file or create a custom hierarchy to define the browser capabilities.

span.span: An object that specifies the capabilities of the browser.

summary.span: 在运行时内部使用，以配置浏览器功能的自定义层次结构。

span.span: Used internally at run time to configure custom hierarchies of browser capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.browser 文件中定义浏览器功能。You define browser capabilities in a .browser file. 你可以.browser 文件中使用的默认层次结构，或创建自定义的层次结构，以定义的浏览器功能。You can use the default hierarchy in the .browser file or create a custom hierarchy to define the browser capabilities. 方法处理自定义的层次结构。The method processes a custom hierarchy. 自定义的层次结构必须包含`parentID`中的值`browser`元素。The custom hierarchy must contain a `parentID` value in the `browser` element.
